name: planet earth is blue and there's nothing i can do
description:
3500x3500
600ppp
original drawing: 49 cm x 52 cm
oil pastels and markers on canvas
''there is something that will never be able to be captured in any attempt of immortalization, and that thing seems to me the most unbelievably magical one about existing. you can talk about it, write it, try to draw it, and listen to the trace while you do it, but don't try to copy it faithfully, better accompany it while it is being, try to dance with it till the result composition is sublime and warm with scrawls when I close my eyes the warmest of smiles''
this is something i wrote after listening and drawing Space Oddity on LSD
